title: I need some rp
body: Im currently only 3250 rp off of obtaining Pulsefire Ezreal, so i decided to do some rp art for Rito. Rito plox <3 http://imgur.com/zLgvmej (its called "a white hecarim in the snow"

replies.body: nice picture mate!!! i would give u 32500 rp for that!!!!!
thanks man, that means alot to me
